description: Cockpit takes many of the complicated parts of system administration (storage, networking, containers) and presents it in a simple, easy-to-understand graphical package. Many of the capabilities it has have been available to GNOME and other desktop environments in the past, however with Cockpit, these capabilities are now made available for headless server systems as well, thanks to its extremely powerful and slick web interface.
summary: Finally an administrative console that works

description: Only thing which IMHO is a needed feature is windows support (to check on my admin linux laptop what the windows clients do)
This is a rock-solid server administration tool for advanced and new Linux users alike.
summary: This is the server GUI you're looking for
